verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--"dvitīya-pāte bāḍa' anna-vyañjana
tomāya āmāya āji ekatra kariba bhojana

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; dvitīya-pāte—on a second leaf; bāḍa'-deliver; anna-vyañjana—cooked rice and vegetables; tomāya āmāya—both you and I; āji—today; ekatra—together; kariba bhojana—will take lunch.
translation: The Lord said, "Spread another leaf with a helping of rice and vegetables so that today you and I may take lunch together."
